lenders.occupational_info: I work inside the writer's room on a television series. I have found the job I have always wanted, and would like for others to be able to do the same.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I was stunned by how little most people wanted to borrow. With a few days of pocket change we are able to help someone change his/her life.

lenders.name: Bryan

lenders.name: Brant
lenders.loan_because: ...I want to help where I can.

lenders.name: Jim

lenders.loan_because: i care ♥

lenders.occupational_info: Just too much of it.

lenders.name: Kriszta
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of Kiva and it is the least I can do.

lenders.loan_because: I need loan for my mother house repairing , because until now I am still live at my mother house.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an employee in a catering company in jakarta , indonesia. I am only as a staff operation .

lenders.name: Jayar
lenders.loan_because: The new web has finally brought my generation into civil engagement - we are excited to contribute to civic life and collaborate with people worldwide! I am both glad and proud that the Kiva freethinking community is helping put to rest the belief that non-theists are amoral and selfish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a case manager and community aide for individuals who have acquired head injuries. I help them to organize and execute life goals to develop positive everyday routines aimed at increasing their independence.

lenders.name: Loré
lenders.loan_because: I've had it hard myself, and I know what it's like to just need a little more than you have- I was lucky enough to have something come through for me- it's only right for me to pay that kind of thing forward.

lenders.name: riozelle
lenders.loan_because:
I want to give back for being blessed.  

"Give a person a fish and you will feed them for a day: Teach them to fish and you feed them for a lifetime."

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance really works.  God has called us to serve others, so I have found a small way to help change lives in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: Gordon

lenders.occupational_info: I sell shoes online for adidas.

lenders.name: Noel Oco
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed with amazing opportunities and I want to share to those who need it the most around the world. God bless you all in your journey. 

"Live Simply that Others Might Simply Live." (Elizabeth Anne Seton)

"If you can't feed a hundred people, then just feed one." (Mother Teresa)
lenders.occupational_info:
"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can (positively) change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." (Margaret Mead)

"Be the Change You Want to See in the World." (Gandhi)

"Trust the past to the Mercy of God, the present to His Love, and the future to His Providence." (St. Augustine)

I am in the process of entering a Catholic Monastery. For the mean time I am working for local charities to help as a Fundraiser and Volunteer.

lenders.name: Jorge & Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: It makes us happier and we hope we can help you so you can help someone else too.

lenders.name: Margot

lenders.name: Ajey
lenders.loan_because: humanity

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: this sustainable charity deserves support.

lenders.name: Sagun
lenders.loan_because: I want  loan to devlop  my  restaurant business.
lenders.occupational_info: We want to introduce you to a new taste which is reflective of unique Nepalese Indian cuisine. Born in the mountain of the Himalayas this has become a favorite style of food throughout the world. The difference is in the seasoning. Using the finest vegetables, meats and seafoods, full flavored fancy spices and modest Nepali herbs combine to provide a culinary experience.

Whitney: I print newsletters and other paper information for my church.

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: MJR
lenders.occupational_info:
In an effort to assist with employment in this recession.  I have developed a Network of Consultants.  However, it is difficult to raise funding for pre-project activities.  One small project can employ from 20 to 25 persons and larger projects several hundreds.

I am trying to raise funds so that we can access more projects.  Need to raise a total of US$25,000.00.  Will repay loan over 12 months period and  return will be 50%.  So if you lend us 1000 dollars - we repay you $1,500 over the one year period.

I hope to be able to lend on this Network, some time in the near future...

Thanks and God Bless....

lenders.occupational_info: Apexstone Amoy Marble & Granite,a Xiamen,China based manufacturer and exporter of worldwide marble , worldwide granite , china granite, china marble , sand stone, travertine, limestone, Our range covers slab, tile, countertop, vanity top, tub surround, soap dish, sink, fireplace mantel, stone molding, mosaic, medallion, drawer knob, for interior designers; fountain, sculpture, statuary, stone carving, urns and vases, for decoration specialists; lite panel wall cladding, column, baluster, railing, step, garden furniture, paving stone, for architects; on commercial projects or industrial constructions.

lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my abundance of opportunities and advantages and wish to pay that forward to other women entrepreneurs. I believe in the power of pursuing dreams and achieving goals. $1 from each sale of my jewelry goes into my fund. I hope to be able to make larger and larger loans as my own business succeeds.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the designer and metalsmith of a line of jewelry called Elixir9. I work with sterling silver, semi-precious stones, and other mixed media. I fabricate each piece by hand in my San Francisco studio.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the success of those that strive to become independent and self sufficient

lenders.name: sane1147
lenders.loan_because: Jesus is my personal saviour.  God tells us to love others.

lenders.name: Jennifer L.
lenders.loan_because:
Both my parents came to Canada as refugees. I am fortunate to have been born and raised in a country with many freedoms and privileges, with rights that are enforced and women are allowed to be independent and strong.

I have always been one to volunteer my time and efforts, rather than donate money. The money I donate is worth less than the time and efforts of educated, caring people. 

My mother is a proud woman who would rather accept a helping hand, than a red pocket (an envelope of money in Chinese, a "hand out" in other words). She has taught me this lesson and I have extended it out to others. 

"Give a man a fish; feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish; feed him for a lifetime." - Lao Tzu

lenders.name: Silje
lenders.loan_because: Respecting a strangers wish to make a living by hard work and pride in his or her work, is something everyone should do. I have previously been an entrepreneur myself. I think everyone should help eachother as much as we can, strangers as friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer teacher. I teach in a variety of computer software to people of all ages. Some are beginners while some are experts. I love my job!

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate, and I believe me must help others reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: As an insurance agent I help people protect their homes and assets in the event of a catastrophe.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: To help people get success

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: by an "accident" of birth I live in the richest nation in the world and I feel compelled to share in whatever ways I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a chief financial recordkeeper for a nonprofit organization in my community.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I have it so good, and so many other people don't!

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and have needed help in the past. It is time to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Family Nurse Practitioner and own my own clinic.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Service is the rent we pay for our time on earth.  Honest, hardworking people are worth helping.

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Eliza
lenders.loan_because: i believe in it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a law student in New York City

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: Bob Harris (/lender/bobharris) says it's a good idea to, and I see his point.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help the people who write newspapers with their computers. They usually need it. I've been at it since 1995.

My work involves travel, and I've been as far west as Guam, east as Ireland, north as Alaska and south as Hawaii.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think that it will make life better for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage credit card portfolios for a large bank.

lenders.name: Dayna
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people

lenders.name: Rabbinical Students
lenders.occupational_info:
Shalom!   

We are the student body of the Reconstructionist Rabbinical College.  We are loaning to Kiva as one of our many tzedakah projects in order to help people around the world.

We believe that all people are created b'tzelem Elohim, in the image of the Holy One, and that it is our sacred obligation to help people in need wherever they may live change their lives forever.  Thus, whenever we collect enough funds, we loan to whomever is first on the list, without discrimination.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: a little bit can go a long way
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids with special needs or who are in special circumstances

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I like to see those succeed who try.

lenders.name: Evelyn Olson Lamden
lenders.loan_because: We believe in supporting women-owned businesses.  Our company, as "Experts on Women," hopes to empower women in all phases of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Red Kite Business Advisors is a consulting firm offering marketing, planning, advertising, creative, branding, strategies, tactics and media consulting services.  We help clients increase market share, improve ROI, and create brand advocates.  We specialize in marketing b2b and b2c, with an expertise in reaching the female market.

lenders.name: candice
lenders.loan_because: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

lenders.name: Holli
lenders.loan_because: I like to be connected to the other side of the world. I also like to help others through their rough times. I want to give encouragement to people to help them follow their dreams and their dreams for their kids. It makes me feel better about myself too. The loans I give is not only helping the people recieving them, it helps me feel better and encourage me to help more.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I love it. Went to Haiti when I was 15 and changed my life forever. Kiva is amazing revolutionary tool that could change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked anywhere from nonprofit management to marketing project manager.

lenders.name: Claudio
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make an impact on people's lives around the world and help alleviate their problems through micro-investing.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn things in school.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My company performs medical diagnostic testing to help develop new treatments and improve medical care.

lenders.name: peterfriday
lenders.loan_because: joel and alison.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sweet boats

lenders.name: brainwise
lenders.occupation: Tech Writer, Interfaith Minister, Theater Techie
lenders.loan_because: I can. Really, it's as simple as that. Oh, and because I really got behind Sloane Berrent and her mission (see http://www.thecausemopolitan.com/)

lenders.name: RSR
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for future generations of people - all people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the non-profit sector in the United States and I help young people get access to important educational materials and knowledge.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: to be able to help people grow and achieve higher life goals
lenders.occupational_info: private equity investments

lenders.name: Sherman
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: people share a lot with me, so I'm doing likewise.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because:
I feel blessed to live in a country like Canada where most of us have so much to be thankful for.  
It feels good to be able to help out, so others can benefit...and in time they too may be able to 'Pay Forward'!
